thread.title: Jimmy Kimmel trolls Matt Damon throughout Oscars
thread.title_full: Jimmy Kimmel trolls Matt Damon throughout Oscars

author: KATE FELDMAN
title: Jimmy Kimmel trolls Matt Damon throughout Oscars
text:
Jimmy Kimmel trolls Matt Damon throughout Oscars Jimmy Kimmel trolls Matt Damon throughout Oscars NEW YORK DAILY NEWS  56 PM 
Jimmy Kimmel and Matt Damon’s ongoing feud couldn’t even take a night off for the Oscars. 
The two longtime frenemies continued their battle during the award show Sunday night as Kimmel roasted his friend. 
“I’ve known Matt so long when I first met Matt I was the fat one,” the host said during his opening monologue before acknowledging that Damon “gave” the starring role in “Manchester by the Sea” to Casey Affleck while he made the “Chinese ponytail movie.” 
“That movie, ‘The Great Wall,’ went on to lose $80 million. Smooth move, dumb a--.” 
The gag continued throughout the evening as the two traded barbs — Damon even tried to trip Kimmel at one point. Jimmy Kimmel and Matt Damon ramped up their feud during the Oscars Sunday night. (Chris Pizzello/Chris Pizzello/Invision/AP) 
Near the end of the show, Kimmel doubled down on the duel with a showing of Damon’s “We Bought a Zoo.” 
“He shows you how he’s able to hear words and then repeat them back,” Kimmel says during a live commentary. 
“That’s the thing about Matt: he has almost no discernible talent but it works.” 
While presenting best original screenplay with Ben Affleck, Damon was introduced as “guest” before he tried to begin his speech. Kimmel even tried to play Damon off the stage while he was presenting an award. (LUCY NICHOLSON/REUTERS) 
Except Kimmel, below the stage with the orchestra, encouraged the band to get louder and louder every time his enemy spoke. 
“My God, you gotta be kidding me,” Damon shouted over the music. “What is with the music. I’m just presenting, why are you playing me off?” 
Kimmel even got in one final jab before best picture was announced, saying he was glad that Damon had once again not won an Academy Award. 
Damon and Kimmel’s ongoing feud, which goes back to 2005, was a focal point up during the ceremony, but they’d been ramping up the drama leading up to the Oscars. Dead man walking the red carpet. #Oscars pic.twitter.com/j2KaUkdHTX — Jimmy Kimmel (@jimmykimmel) February 27, 2017 
Asked about Kimmel’s hosting gig on “The Ellen DeGeneres Show” earlier in the month, Damon spoke with brutal honesty. 
“I mean, it's terrible for everybody,” he said. “I have extremely low expectations for his performance on Oscar night.” 
Kimmel responded with a photo of himself watching Damon enter the Dolby Theatre. 
“Dead man walking the red carpet,” he captioned the photo. Join the Conversation:
